knimeNode.name: Text to Spark
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads text into a Spark RDD

fullDescription.intro:
Reads text from HDFS into a Spark RDD.
Notice: This feature requires at least Spark 1.6.

ports.inPort: A HDFS compatible connection to the remote cluster (HDFS, WebHDFS or HttpFS)
Optional Spark context. If not connected a context is created based on the settings in the Spark preferences page.
